state_description: This screen allows users to view and manage large and old files on their Mac. Users can select files to remove in order to free up disk space.

enables.name: Select File
enables.description: Select a file from the list to perform actions on it.

enables.name: Remove Immediately
enables.description: Remove the selected files immediately to free up space.

enables.name: Sort by Size
enables.description: Sort the list of files by size to easily identify the largest files.

enables.name: Search Files
enables.description: Search for specific files using the search bar.

enables.name: Back
enables.description: Navigate back to the previous screen.
